description:
Ratchet & Clank 2: Going Commando is a third-person shooter platform game originally for the PlayStation 2. Play as
Ratchet and Clank as they attempt to unravel a conspiracy in a new galaxy involving a mysterious "pet project"
orchestrated by the shadowy MegaCorp.

v0.4.1.description:
## Changes
- Big code refactor on the back end. This will make it easier for me to focus on new features going forward. I'm sure this will have both created and solved bugs that I didn't catch, so let me know if you notice anything unusual.
- Added in-game message when sending items to other players.
- Setting `iso_start` in `host.yaml` to a file path will cause PCSX2 to start with the `-batch` flag.
- `Hrugis`, `Gorn` and `Damosel` are no longer eligible starting planets. (I might add a hard mode option for starting planets back later)
- I now distribute a simplified version of the options yaml. For the full weighted version, use `Generate Templates`.

## Fixes
- The refactor should fix any `StrEnum` related incompatibilities with other games
- Some minor logic fixes snuck their way into the big refactor.
- Tried to fix black screen that can occur if a death is queued when landing on a planet. (You could get out of this by resetting to ship shack but it caused the ship to go "SCP Mode")
- Spiderbot Glove now only appears as part of the multiworld item pool and not in the shop.
- Fix forced spawn at Glider course on `Tabora`
- Fix forced spawn at Hypnotist on `Damosel`

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1

## Known Issues
- Lots of weird edge cases with Deathlink. I would consider this an unstable feature still.
- The taxi near the Hypnotist on `Damosel` may not arrive when it should.
- Some of the `Hypnomatic Part` locations still give their original popup message.

# Docs #
For more info on what this randomizer does, take a look at the [readme](https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/blob/main/README.md).
Please take a look at the full [setup guide](https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/blob/main/docs/setup_en.md) to get started.
There's also an excellent [setup video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hRCuEQVgzPE) by [Scyker](https://www.youtube.com/@scyker).

# Supported Game Version
This only works with the following version of the game for now:
    - Platform: `Playstation 2` (This project will not be tackling the Playstation 3 versions)
    - Version: `1.01`
    - Serial: `SCUS-97268`
    - CRC: `38996035`
    - MD5: `3cbbb5127ee8a0be93ef0876f7781ee8`

There is rooms for other versions/regions to be added in the future.

# Basic Setup
## AP World Installation

1. Unzip the downloaded Ratchet & Clank 2 apworld zip file
2. Double-click the `rac2.apworld` to install it to your local Archipelago instance

## PCSX2 Settings
- Enable PINE in PCSX2
  - In PCSX2, Under Tools, **Check** Show Advanced Settings
  - In PCSX2, System -> Settings -> Advanced tab -> PINE Settings,
    **Check** Enable and ensure Slot is set to `28011`
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1

v0.4.2.description:
## Fixes
- Fixed issue where any `Hypnomatic Part` would put `Hypnomatic` checks in logic.
- Fixed itempool issues if more than one rac2 game was being rolled.
- Fixed some typos.

v0.4.2.title: v0.4.2

v0.5.0.description:
## New Contributors
Thanks to @Dinopony for all the hard work getting so many additions in on a short time frame. Very impressive to be able to pick up a project like this and get going so fast.

Shoutout to @cloudofdarkhole6 for the excellent work on the [Tracker](https://github.com/cloudofdarkhole6/RaC2-poptracker/releases)

##  Changes
* Add an "Allow First Person Mode" option by @Dinopony in https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/pull/10
* Add `Go to Ship Shack` to the Special menu as an alternative way to reset.
* Add an "Enable Bolt Multiplier" option by @Dinopony in https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/pull/9
* Slot Name gets automatically set if client is opened using the patch.
* Made some improvements to the patching process.
* Randomize wrench upgrades by @Dinopony in https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/pull/13
* Add options to remove reward degradation on revisit & successive kills by @Dinopony in https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/pull/14 
* Add a "Free Challenge Selection" option by @Dinopony in https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/pull/21
* Add XP multiplier options for Nanotech & weapons by @Dinopony in https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/pull/22
* Add text injection for longer strings by @Dinopony in https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/pull/23 Fixes #16 
* Unify text handling by @Dinopony in https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/pull/24
* Make "unable to escape" warnings less annoying. More work to be done with this.
* Add `host.yaml` setting to use existing PCSX2 game settings file. Fixes #12

## Fixes
* Heli-Pack is now a logic requirement for getting to Worker Bots on `Notak`.
* Fix bug that prevented rolling more than one rac2 game in a multiworld if `shuffle_weapon_vendors` was enabled. Fixes #15
* Add extra inventory syncing to Clank packs. Fixes #11
* Add extra inventory syncing to Charge Boots. (need more testing to confirm fix)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/compare/v0.4.2...v0.5.0

## Known Issues
- Lots of weird edge cases with Deathlink. I would consider this an unstable feature still.
- The taxi near the Hypnotist on `Damosel` may not arrive when it should.
- Some of the `Hypnomatic Part` locations still give their original popup message.

# Docs #
For more info on what this randomizer does, take a look at the [readme](https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/blob/main/README.md).
Please take a look at the full [setup guide](https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/blob/main/docs/setup_en.md) to get started.
There's also an excellent [setup video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hRCuEQVgzPE) by [Scyker](https://www.youtube.com/@scyker).

# Supported Game Version
This only works with the following version of the game for now:
    - Platform: `Playstation 2` (This project will not be tackling the Playstation 3 versions)
    - Version: `1.01`
    - Serial: `SCUS-97268`
    - CRC: `38996035`
    - MD5: `3cbbb5127ee8a0be93ef0876f7781ee8`

There is rooms for other versions/regions to be added in the future.

# Basic Setup
## AP World Installation

1. Unzip the downloaded Ratchet & Clank 2 apworld zip file
2. Double-click the `rac2.apworld` to install it to your local Archipelago instance

## PCSX2 Settings
- Enable PINE in PCSX2
  - In PCSX2, Under Tools, **Check** Show Advanced Settings
  - In PCSX2, System -> Settings -> Advanced tab -> PINE Settings,
    **Check** Enable and ensure Slot is set to `28011`
v0.5.0.title: v0.5.0

v0.5.1.description:
## Fixes
* Fixed crashing and other corruption introduced in the last update. @Dinopony
* `weapon_xp_multiplier` option minimum is now larger to prevent generation crash. @Dinopony
* Fixed Qwark Statue trade message missing the "triangle button" character since the refactor. @Dinopony
* Fixed cheated items (obtained through !getitem) not having the proper classification color. @Dinopony


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

v0.5.1.title: v0.5.1

v0.6.0.description:
##  Changes
* Isolate memory card between seeds by @Dinopony
* Improved text notification handling by @Dinopony
* Added an option to include all spaceship challenge completions as checks by @Dinopony
* Added options for full randomization of the Megacorp and or Gadgetron vendors and the weapons in them. When enabled, you can switch between a purchase mode and an ammo mode by pressing up/down while in the vendor. by @evilwb
* Overhaul to starting weapons making them a separate option with more control over which weapons are included by @evilwb
* Changed guaranteed number of Platinum Bolts from 40 to 20 to allow more freedom around filler items by @evilwb
* Added an `extended_weapon_progression` option which enables leveling weapons all the way from Lv1 to Lv4 just by accumulating weapon XP by @Dinopony
* Add a "Bolt Pack" filler item by @Dinopony

## Fixes
* Fixed Joba cage matches freezing the game on start by @Dinopony
* Show planets on the starmap menu by @Dinopony
* Fixed Aranos wrench location sometimes not working by @Dinopony
* Fixed !getitem on progressive upgrades raising an exception by @Dinopony
* Fixed Qwark Statuette trade displaying "Received Qwark Statuette" right after trading by @Dinopony
* Clean up Tabora wrench upgrade flag check (may fix spawning in the void) by @Dinopony 


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/compare/v0.5.1...v0.6.0

## Known Issues
- Lots of weird edge cases with Deathlink. I would consider this an unstable feature still.
- The taxi near the Hypnotist on `Damosel` may not arrive when it should.
- Some of the `Hypnomatic Part` locations still give their original popup message.
- Some of the items in the vendors will sometimes have the icon color of upgraded weapons.

# Docs #
For more info on what this randomizer does, take a look at the [readme](https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/blob/main/README.md).
Please take a look at the full [setup guide](https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/blob/main/docs/setup_en.md) to get started.
There's also an excellent [setup video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hRCuEQVgzPE) by [Scyker](https://www.youtube.com/@scyker).

# Supported Game Version
This only works with the following version of the game for now:
    - Platform: `Playstation 2` (This project will not be tackling the Playstation 3 versions)
    - Version: `1.01`
    - Serial: `SCUS-97268`
    - CRC: `38996035`
    - MD5: `3cbbb5127ee8a0be93ef0876f7781ee8`

There is rooms for other versions/regions to be added in the future.

# Basic Setup
## AP World Installation

1. Unzip the downloaded Ratchet & Clank 2 apworld zip file
2. Double-click the `rac2.apworld` to install it to your local Archipelago instance

## PCSX2 Settings
- Enable PINE in PCSX2
  - In PCSX2, Under Tools, **Check** Show Advanced Settings
  - In PCSX2, System -> Settings -> Advanced tab -> PINE Settings,
    **Check** Enable and ensure Slot is set to `28011`

v0.6.2.description:
## Fixes
* Breaking ammo crates while having no ammo based weapons will no longer crash the game. by @evilwb
* Increase minimum `weapon_xp_multiplier` option range and update description by @Dinopony
* Fixed vendor refresh issues for non-local/remote items by @Dinopony
* Removed many cutscenes that could cause issues when triggered at the wrong time by @Dinopony
* `Damosel Pyramid PB` no longer requires `Thermanator` in logic by @evilwb
* Fixed vendor slots for a planet not unlocking if the original weapon from that planet was already upgraded when first visiting the planet. by @Dinopony

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.2

## Known Issues
- Lots of weird edge cases with Deathlink. I would consider this an unstable feature still.
- The taxi near the Hypnotist on `Damosel` may not arrive when it should.
- Some of the `Hypnomatic Part` locations still give their original popup message.
- **The Tabora void bug and getting extra bolts on reload seem to be related to a saving issue. You should be able to mitigate these issues by saving manually before closing the game. Also recommend to save after picking up the Tabora wrench upgrade location.**

# Docs #
For more info on what this randomizer does, take a look at the [readme](https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/blob/main/README.md).
Please take a look at the full [setup guide](https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/blob/main/docs/setup_en.md) to get started.
There's also an excellent [setup video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hRCuEQVgzPE) by [Scyker](https://www.youtube.com/@scyker).

# Supported Game Version
This only works with the following version of the game for now:
    - Platform: `Playstation 2` (This project will not be tackling the Playstation 3 versions)
    - Version: `1.01`
    - Serial: `SCUS-97268`
    - CRC: `38996035`
    - MD5: `3cbbb5127ee8a0be93ef0876f7781ee8`

There is rooms for other versions/regions to be added in the future.

# Basic Setup
## AP World Installation

1. Unzip the downloaded Ratchet & Clank 2 apworld zip file
2. Double-click the `rac2.apworld` to install it to your local Archipelago instance

## PCSX2 Settings
- Enable PINE in PCSX2
  - In PCSX2, Under Tools, **Check** Show Advanced Settings
  - In PCSX2, System -> Settings -> Advanced tab -> PINE Settings,
    **Check** Enable and ensure Slot is set to `28011`
v0.6.2.title: v0.6.2

v0.6.3.description:
## New Contributors
* @Pecomare made their first contribution

## Changes
* Add logic for 1st person mode glitch by @Pecomare
* Intro cutscene can now be skipped by pressing `START`
* Cutscenes no longer require the full `L1+R1+L2+R2+START` combo after loading a save. `START` by itself should now work to skip cutscenes all the time.

## Fixes
* Fix common exception when landing on Yeedil by @Dinopony
* Fix custom data auto-save issues by @Dinopony
* Buying weapons from the vendor when vendor randomization is disabled should work again. There's still a visual bug where the item stays in the vendor until you close and reopen the it.
* Fixed Gadgetron empty vendor crash.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/compare/v0.6.2...v0.6.3

## Known Issues
- Lots of weird edge cases with Deathlink. I would consider this an unstable feature still.
- The taxi near the Hypnotist on `Damosel` may not arrive when it should.
- Some of the `Hypnomatic Part` locations still give their original popup message.
- **The Tabora void bug and getting extra bolts on reload seem to be related to a saving issue. You should be able to mitigate these issues by saving manually before closing the game. Also recommend to save after picking up the Tabora wrench upgrade location.**
- There's a visual bug where purchased items stay in the vendor until you close and reopen the vendor screen when vendor randomization is off.

# Docs #
For more info on what this randomizer does, take a look at the [readme](https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/blob/main/README.md).
Please take a look at the full [setup guide](https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/blob/main/docs/setup_en.md) to get started.
There's also an excellent [setup video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hRCuEQVgzPE) by [Scyker](https://www.youtube.com/@scyker).

# Supported Game Version
This only works with the following version of the game for now:
    - Platform: `Playstation 2` (This project will not be tackling the Playstation 3 versions)
    - Version: `1.01`
    - Serial: `SCUS-97268`
    - CRC: `38996035`
    - MD5: `3cbbb5127ee8a0be93ef0876f7781ee8`

There is rooms for other versions/regions to be added in the future.

# Basic Setup
## AP World Installation

1. Unzip the downloaded Ratchet & Clank 2 apworld zip file
2. Double-click the `rac2.apworld` to install it to your local Archipelago instance

## PCSX2 Settings
- Enable PINE in PCSX2
  - In PCSX2, Under Tools, **Check** Show Advanced Settings
  - In PCSX2, System -> Settings -> Advanced tab -> PINE Settings,
    **Check** Enable and ensure Slot is set to `28011`
v0.6.3.title: v0.6.3

* Make it more clear that the filler generation debug message is from RAC2

## Fixes
* Fix Smolg Warehouse PB logic
* Fix Dobbo Spiderbot Room PB logic

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/evilwb/APRac2/compare/v0.6.3...v0.6.4
